cheat.description: Boomerang Kid - Start with 6 lives
Boomerang Kid - Infinite lives
Linus Spacehead - Start with 9 lives
Linus Spacehead - Increase oxygen
Linus Spacehead - Never lose oxygen
Linus Spacehead - Never lose life in the water
Linus Spacehead - Never lose life in the land
Super Robin Hood - Start with 1 life
Super Robin Hood - Start with 6 lives
Super Robin Hood - Start with 9 lives
Super Robin Hood - Infinite lives
Super Robin Hood - Become invincible
Super Robin Hood - 9 energy hearts, you may lose some hearts when you pick up new ones
Treasure Island Dizzy - Invincible Dizzy (walk left to arrive at the original starting point)
Treasure Island Dizzy - Walk backwards
Treasure Island Dizzy - Start with snorkel
Treasure Island Dizzy - Start with axe (1 of 2)
Treasure Island Dizzy - Start with axe (2 of 2)
Treasure Island Dizzy - Start with dynamite (1 of 2)
Treasure Island Dizzy - Start with dynamite (2 of 2)
Treasure Island Dizzy - Start with heavy weight (1 of 2)
Treasure Island Dizzy - Start with heavy weight (2 of 2)
